      • getLastLocationsUpdate

        public ICancellable getLastLocationsUpdate(LocationsManager.ILastLocationsUpdateResponseListener listener)
        Get last update timestamp. As a result, you will get latest known update timestamp for locations/custom routes/alerts or NULL if specified entry was never changed.
        This API can be useful to peek status of the last update of locations, so you know when you need to request actual locations payload
        Parameters:
        listener - - result listener
